summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 2nd Avenue Northwest and Baker Avenue, each from West 41st Street to West 45th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7149 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
